meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed methyldopas to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained how methyldopas can help manage hypertension.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook my methyldopas for candy, thinking it was a new type of sweet pill.
meanings.sent4: Taking methyldopas is like having a tiny superhero fighting against high blood pressure in your body.
meanings.sent5: The red and white capsules of methyldopas reminded me of miniature lifesavers guarding my health.
